title: Bug 49536 - Accessing a URL with no webapps deployed returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: The server should return an HTTP error 404 response when accessing a URL with no webapps deployed.
SR:
1. Download and extract the Tomcat 7 v7.0.0beta release.
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL on the server and observe the response.
